titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 625) to regulate large capacity ammunition feeding devices.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 625) to regulate large capacity ammunition feeding devices.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. DeGette. Petition No: 118-8.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 625) to regulate large capacity ammunition feeding devices.
